```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
emma <- read_csv("Emma.csv") %>%
  select(-c("GDPR","Name","Public","Region","Age","Education","Occupation"))

emma$Type <- as.factor(emma$Type)
p_load(plyr)
emma$Type <- revalue(emma$Type, c("Anden del af men"="After but", "Første del af men"="Before but", "Ikke spørgsmål" = "Not question", "Komplekse sætninger ish" = "Complex sentences", "Med men ish" = "With but", "Simple negative ish" = "Simple negative", "Simple positive ish" = "Simple positive", "Spørgsmål" = "Questions"))

# write_csv(emma, "Emma_all.csv")

emma <- read_csv("Emma.csv")

emma$Text <- as.factor(emma$Text)

p_load(broom)

grouped_df <- emma %>%
  group_by(Text) %>%
  summarise(Valence = mean(Valence), Intensity = mean(Intensity), Controllability = mean(Controllability), Utility = mean(Utility), Type = Type) %>%
  distinct


write_csv(grouped_df, "C:/Users/esben/Desktop/git/emma/Emma/emma.csv")


getwd()
```
